vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Kenite = "smiths"
n pr gent
the tribe from which the father-in-law of Moses was a member and which lived in the area between southern Palestine and the mountains of Sinai
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
陽性專有名詞
該隱 这个字在原文的意思是 "擁有"
1) 亞當和夏娃最大的兒子, 人類第一位謀殺者, 他殺了自己的兄弟亞伯
種族名稱
基尼 = "鐵匠"
2) 摩西的岳父所屬的部落名稱, 此部落位於巴勒斯坦南邊和西奈山之間{#民 24:22|}
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
阳性专有名词
该隐 这个字在原文的意思是 "拥有"
1) 亚当和夏娃最大的儿子, 人类第一位谋杀者, 他杀了自己的兄弟亚伯
种族名称
基尼 = "铁匠"
2) 摩西的岳父所属的部落名称, 此部落位于巴勒斯坦南边和西奈山之间{#民 24:22|}

vocabinfos.relatedNos: [{'strongNumber': 'G2535', 'matchingForm': 'Κάϊν', 'stepTransliteration': 'kain', 'gloss': 'Cain', '_searchResultRange': 'Heb.11.4-Jude.1.11@Gen.4.1-Jude.1.11', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '該隱', '_es_Gloss': 'Caín', '_zh_Gloss': '该隐'}, {'strongNumber': 'H7014A', 'matchingForm': 'קַ֫יִן', 'stepTransliteration': 'qa.yin', 'gloss': 'Kain', '_searchResultRange': 'Num.24.22-Josh.15.57', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '該隱', '_es_Gloss': 'Caín', '_zh_Gloss': '该隐'}, {'strongNumber': 'H7014G', 'matchingForm': 'קַ֫יִן', 'stepTransliteration': 'qa.yin', 'gloss': 'Kenite', '_searchResultRange': 'Gen.15.19-1Ch@Gen.15.19-1Chr.2.55', '_zh_tw_Gloss': '該隱', '_es_Gloss': 'Caín', '_zh_Gloss': '该隐'}]
vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.1;
son of: Adam (H0121) and Eve (H2332);
brother of: Abel (H1893) and Seth (H8352);
father of: Enoch (H2585)
Also named: Kain<\i> (Κάϊν "Cain" G2535)
§ Cain = "possession"
n pr m
eldest son of Adam and Eve and the first murderer having murdered his brother
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   hijo de Adán; (2b)   pueblo; (2c)   ciudad; territorio de Judá

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Ancestors of Heber (H2268H) or Hobab (H2246), first mentioned at Gen.15.19
Group of qe.ni (קֵינִי "Kenite" H7017)
§ Cain = "possession"
n pr m
eldest son of Adam and Eve and the first murderer having murdered his brother
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a)   hijo de Adán; (2b)   pueblo; (2c)   ciudad; territorio de Judá
